ndarray/tables/detail/Iterator.hpp

00001 #ifndef NDARRAY_TABLES_DETAIL_Iterator_hpp_INCLUDED
00002 #define NDARRAY_TABLES_DETAIL_Iterator_hpp_INCLUDED
00003 
00004 #include "ndarray_fwd.hpp"
00005 #include "ndarray/tables/detail/TraitsAccess.hpp"
00006 
00007 #include <boost/iterator/iterator_facade.hpp>
00008 
00009 namespace ndarray { namespace tables { namespace detail {
00010 
00011 template <typename T>
00012 class Iterator : public boost::iterator_facade< 
00013     Iterator<T>, 
00014     typename TraitsAccess<T>::Row_,
00015     boost::random_access_traversal_tag, 
00016     typename TraitsAccess<T>::Row_
00017     > 
00018 {
00019 public:
00020 
00021     typedef typename TraitsAccess<T>::Row_ Value;
00022     typedef Value Reference;
00023 
00024     Reference operator[](int n) const {
00025         return Reference(getRow()._n + n, getRow()._columns);
00026     }
00027 
00028     Reference const & operator*() const { return _ref; }
00029 
00030     Reference const * operator->() { return &_ref; }
00031 
00032     Iterator() : _ref() {}
00033 
00034     explicit Iterator(Reference const & ref) : _ref(ref) {}
00035 
00036     Iterator(Iterator const & other) : _ref(other._ref) {}
00037 
00038     template <typename U>
00039     Iterator(Iterator<U> const & other) : _ref(other._ref) {}
00040     
00041     Iterator & operator=(Iterator const & other) {
00042         if (&other != this) _ref = other._ref;
00043         return *this;
00044     }
00045 
00046     template <typename U>
00047     Iterator & operator=(Iterator<U> const & other) {
00048         if (&other != this) _ref = other._ref;
00049         return *this;
00050     }
00051 
00052 private:
00053 
00054     friend class boost::iterator_core_access;
00055 
00056     template <typename U> friend class Iterator;
00057 
00058     Row<T> & getRow() { return _ref; }
00059     Row<T> const & getRow() const { return _ref; }
00060 
00061     Reference const & dereference() const { return _ref; }
00062 
00063     void increment() { ++getRow()._n; }
00064     void decrement() { --getRow()._n; }
00065     void advance(int n) { getRow()._n += n; }
00066 
00067     template <typename U>
00068     int distance_to(Iterator<U> const & other) const {
00069         return other.getRow()._n - getRow()._n; 
00070     }
00071 
00072     template <typename U>
00073     bool equal(Iterator<U> const & other) const {
00074         return other.getRow()._n == getRow()._n && other.getRow()._columns == other.getRow()._columns;
00075     }
00076 
00077     Reference _ref;
00078 };
00079 
00080 
00081 }}} // namespace ndarray::tables::detail
